import React from 'react'; const productView=(props)=>{ const product = props.product; return (

{product.title}

) /*

<%= product.title %>

<%= product.price %>

<%= product.description %>

<% if (isAuthenticated) { %> <%- include('../includes/add-to-cart.ejs', {product: product}) %> <% } %>
*/ } export default productView;
